reviewText: It has some great Christmas movies.  I haven't had a chance to watch all of them yet, but I will.
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: This is a great inspiring set.It is hard to frown while watching these movies. They are all such beautiful uplifting stories that it is hard to turn them down.The movies aren't all of the same quality but they are all enjoyable. Christmas shoes is clearly the headliner here. While some are t as good as others you will still enjoy each of these.This is great as a gift. I also feel that while faith is strong in these DVDs there isn't an overwhelming preachiness to them. I say this so maybe you would feelore comfortable giving this as a gift. Each movie is heartwarming and has a beautiful message.This set of films should be loved by all.
summary: Buy this for the one you love
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: I had cable turned off because of the cost and found that each month I could have the dvd's instead. The movies are all wonderful and the plus is no commericals. No sorry I dumped the cable and am thrilled I can still watch the movies I have loved over the years.
summary: a must for any collectors dvd collection
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: I bought these movies for my husband's aunt. They are the dullest, sappiest, Christmas movies ever; and she loves them.  Not my cup of tea, but if you love that genre of movies, these are for you.
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: If you are looking for violence and things that will drag you down and depress you, don't buy these movies.  If you are looking for movies that are uplifting with decent morals and that will make you feel good, buy these.  They are all super.  The entire family would enjoy them.
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: It's nice to have movies that inspire and make you feel good!  My family sincerely enjoyed these movies.  Cheesy?  Of course they are! But that's what makes them enjoyable for hopeless romantics and folks who need happy endings.  We saw several of these stories on Hallmark - they were edited for TV - some of these have a few extra scenes not seen on TV.  Think of them as extended versions..  but not that much - so don't get too excited  :)
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: I have enjoyed this holiday movie pack.  People tend to get away from the true meaning of the season.  You will be able to watchand rewatch your favorites
summary: FAITH & FAMILY IS AN EXCELLENT WAY TO SHARE THE TRUE MEANING OF CHRISTMAS
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: Wonderful, heart warming, movies that make you cry, laugh, and remember how special the Christmas Season really is. The value is wonderful and the convenience of the 10-pack is appreciated.
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: Wonderful value for 10 moves. As with the other "Holiday Romance Pack" of movies the same problems do appear. Pixilation and some blurriness and no "play all" feature (goes to menu after each movie).  Still, it's well worth the money and I am very happy to have this set. I wish they would put ALL their movies into these 10 packs!!!
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: This is such a nice collection of holiday movies all on one DVD.  Christmas is my favorite time of the year and I enjoy watching all the holiday movies.
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: I bought this collection mainly because I was looking for A Christmas Visitor (with William DeVane and Meredith Baxter) but purchasing this DVD by itself was a little pricey.  However, it's in this collection, along with The Christmas Hope, another tear-jerker.  Unfortunately Christmas is past now, so I'll watch the other movies next Christmas season.  I've seen all or part of most of these movies on the Hallmark Channel - all good 'family' movies.  But I watched A Christmas Visitor on TV every chance I got, until I purchased this collection.  One word of caution when you watch this one:  at the very end of the movie, make sure you have several tissues nearby - it's hard not to keep tears running down your face.  A wonderful and truly inspirational ending to an outstanding storyline - one of Hallmark's best Christmas movies.  Christmas Hope is another 'sad' movie with an uplifting and happy ending.  This collection is worth buying.
summary: You can't go wrong with Hallmark Christmas movies...
Title: Faith & Family Holiday: Collection (The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, The Christmas Hope, The Christmas Box, Christmas Comes Home To Canaan / and more)

reviewText: i'm always looking for good holiday movies which for me begin right after Halloween! There's plenty to choose from in this selection!
